casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Lee THOMAS. No. 52P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

*848The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of January 2005 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
